short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily access Mollie test cards while testing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This convenient extension revolutionizes the way you access Mollie test cards for your development and testing needs. No more wasting time searching the web or navigating through different websites. With this extension, you can effortlessly copy the Mollie test cards to your clipboard with just a few clicks.

The extension integrates seamlessly into your Chrome browser, providing quick and easy access to a comprehensive list of Mollie test cards. Simply right-click on any webpage, select the Mollie test cards option from the context menu, and instantly access all the available test cards.

Gone are the days of manual typing or searching for test card details. This extension eliminates the hassle by providing a streamlined solution. Once you've selected a test card, it's instantly copied to your clipboard, ready to be pasted wherever you need it. Whether you're integrating Mollie payment functionality into your website or working on a development project, this extension ensures efficiency and saves you valuable time.

Experience the convenience and speed of this extension. Simplify your workflow, enhance your productivity, and say goodbye to unnecessary searching. Install the extension today and enjoy seamless access to Mollie test cards at your fingertips.

* This extension is not officially done by Mollie, and it has not been made in cooperation with Mollie.
